For clarity in language Game Mechanics is being split from Setting. Unlike Settings pages, there is generally no need for separate references to "past" vs "future" except where it directly relates to changes in available equipment or resources.

Guidelines for Suggestions

New Mechanics/Systems

When proposing a new mechanic or system make sure that it integrates fully with the already accepted systems, especially those already put into code and play. Make sure to clearly note, possibly in the Talk page, how the suggested system improves some aspect of the game. A new mechanic should meet all of the following criteria; A) fitting the Peragro Tempus focus (three portals/three societies/two times).
B) Improving the game experience of players by adding additional functionality without adversely impacting balance.
C) Improving the dynamicity of the game world without adversely impacting balance or existing game-play.
D) Providing a scheme/world that is recognizably unique to PT.

Alternate Mechanics/Systems

In addition to the above features, a new scheme should be at least as developed as the proposal/system it is intended to replace. Thus, a proposal has significantly lower requirements to be legitimate challenger to another incomplete proposal than to a system which is complete and integrated with all other systems it might touch.
